variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.

variables.name: SUBJID
variables.label: Subject Identifier for the Study
variables.cdisc_notes: Subject identifier, which must be unique within the study.

variables.name: RFSTDTC
variables.label: Subject Reference Start Date/Time
variables.cdisc_notes: Reference start date/time for the subject in ISO 8601 character format. Usually the date of first dose of study treatment.

variables.name: RFENDTC
variables.label: Subject Reference End Date/Time
variables.cdisc_notes: Reference end date/time for the subject in ISO 8601 character format. Usually the date of last dose of study treatment.

variables.name: RFXSTDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of First Study Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: First date/time of study treatment, in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: RFXENDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Last Study Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: Last date/time of study treatment, in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: RFICDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Informed Consent
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of informed consent in ISO 8601 character format.

variables.name: RFPENDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of End of Participation
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time when subject ended participation or follow-up, in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: DTHDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Death
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of death in ISO 8601 character format.

variables.name: DTHFL
variables.label: Subject Death Flag
variables.cdisc_notes: Indicates the subject died. Should be Y or null.

variables.name: SITEID
variables.label: Study Site Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a site within a study.

variables.name: BRTHDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Birth
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of birth in ISO 8601 character format.

variables.name: AGE
variables.label: Age
variables.cdisc_notes: Age expressed in AGEU. May be derived from BRTHDTC and RFSTDTC.

variables.name: AGEU
variables.label: Age Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Units associated with AGE.

variables.name: SEX
variables.label: Sex
variables.cdisc_notes: Sex of the subject.

variables.name: RACE
variables.label: Race
variables.cdisc_notes: Race of the subject. Sponsors should refer to FDA guidance for collection of race and ethnicity data.

variables.name: ETHNIC
variables.label: Ethnicity
variables.cdisc_notes: Ethnicity of the subject.

variables.name: ARMCD
variables.label: Planned Arm Code
variables.cdisc_notes: Short name of the arm to which the subject was assigned, limited to 20 characters.

variables.name: ARM
variables.label: Description of Planned Arm
variables.cdisc_notes: Name of the arm to which the subject was assigned.

variables.name: ACTARMCD
variables.label: Actual Arm Code
variables.cdisc_notes: Short name of the actual arm, limited to 20 characters.

variables.name: ACTARM
variables.label: Description of Actual Arm
variables.cdisc_notes: Description of the actual arm.

variables.name: COUNTRY
variables.label: Country
variables.cdisc_notes: Country of the investigational site in which the subject participated in the trial, using ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 codes.

variables.name: DMDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Collection
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of demographic data collection.

variables.name: DMDY
variables.label: Study Day of Collection
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of collection, measured as integer days.

AE.structure: One record per adverse event per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: AESEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness of records within a domain for a subject.

variables.name: AESPID
variables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Sponsor-defined reference number.

variables.name: AETERM
variables.label: Reported Term for the Adverse Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim name of the event.

variables.name: AEMODIFY
variables.label: Modified Reported Term
variables.cdisc_notes: If AETERM is modified to facilitate coding, then AEMODIFY will contain the modified text.

variables.name: AEDECOD
variables.label: Dictionary-Derived Term
variables.cdisc_notes: Dictionary-derived text description of AETERM. Equivalent to the Preferred Term (PT) in MedDRA.

variables.name: AEBODSYS
variables.label: Body System or Organ Class
variables.cdisc_notes: Dictionary-derived. Body system or organ class used in the coding dictionary (e.g., MedDRA SOC).

variables.name: AESEV
variables.label: Severity/Intensity
variables.cdisc_notes: The severity or intensity of the event.

variables.name: AESER
variables.label: Serious Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Is this a serious event?

variables.name: AEACN
variables.label: Action Taken with Study Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: Describes changes to the study treatment as a result of the event.

variables.name: AEREL
variables.label: Causality
variables.cdisc_notes: Records the investigator's opinion as to the causality of the event to the treatment.

variables.name: AEOUT
variables.label: Outcome of Adverse Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Description of the outcome of the event.

variables.name: AESCAN
variables.label: Involves Cancer
variables.cdisc_notes: Was the serious event associated with cancer?

variables.name: AESCONG
variables.label: Congenital Anomaly or Birth Defect
variables.cdisc_notes: Was the event associated with congenital anomaly or birth defect?

variables.name: AESDISAB
variables.label: Persist or Signif Disability/Incapacity
variables.cdisc_notes: Did the event result in persistent or significant disability/incapacity?

variables.name: AESDTH
variables.label: Results in Death
variables.cdisc_notes: Did the AE result in death?

variables.name: AESHOSP
variables.label: Requires or Prolongs Hospitalization
variables.cdisc_notes: Did the event require or prolong hospitalization?

variables.name: AESLIFE
variables.label: Is Life Threatening
variables.cdisc_notes: Was the event life threatening?

variables.name: AESMIE
variables.label: Other Medically Important Serious Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Is the event of sufficient medical importance to report as serious?

variables.name: AECONTRT
variables.label: Concomitant or Additional Trtmnt Given
variables.cdisc_notes: Was concomitant/additional treatment given for this event?

variables.name: AESTDTC
variables.label: Start Date/Time of Adverse Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Start date/time of the adverse event in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: AEENDTC
variables.label: End Date/Time of Adverse Event
variables.cdisc_notes: End date/time of the adverse event in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: AESTDY
variables.label: Study Day of Start of Adverse Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of start of the adverse event relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.

variables.name: AEENDY
variables.label: Study Day of End of Adverse Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of end of the adverse event relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.

CM.structure: One record per recorded medication occurrence or constant-dosing interval per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: CMSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: CMTRT
variables.label: Reported Name of Drug, Med, or Therapy
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim medication name.

variables.name: CMMODIFY
variables.label: Modified Reported Name
variables.cdisc_notes: If CMTRT is modified for coding, CMMODIFY will contain the modified text.

variables.name: CMDECOD
variables.label: Standardized Medication Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Standardized or dictionary-derived name of CMTRT.

variables.name: CMCAT
variables.label: Category for Medication
variables.cdisc_notes: Used to define a category of medications.

variables.name: CMDOSE
variables.label: Dose per Administration
variables.cdisc_notes: Amount of CMTRT administered.

variables.name: CMDOSU
variables.label: Dose Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Units for CMDOSE.

variables.name: CMDOSFRQ
variables.label: Dosing Frequency per Interval
variables.cdisc_notes: Usually expressed as the number of doses per time period.

variables.name: CMROUTE
variables.label: Route of Administration
variables.cdisc_notes: Route of administration.

variables.name: CMSTDTC
variables.label: Start Date/Time of Medication
variables.cdisc_notes: Start date/time of the medication in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: CMENDTC
variables.label: End Date/Time of Medication
variables.cdisc_notes: End date/time of the medication in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: CMSTDY
variables.label: Study Day of Start of Medication
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of start of medication relative to RFSTDTC.

variables.name: CMENDY
variables.label: Study Day of End of Medication
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of end of medication relative to RFSTDTC.

variables.name: CMINDC
variables.label: Indication
variables.cdisc_notes: Denotes why a medication was taken or administered.

EX.structure: One record per constant-dosing interval per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: EXSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: EXTRT
variables.label: Name of Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: Name of the study treatment.

variables.name: EXDOSE
variables.label: Dose
variables.cdisc_notes: Amount of treatment administered.

variables.name: EXDOSU
variables.label: Dose Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Units for EXDOSE.

variables.name: EXDOSFRM
variables.label: Dose Form
variables.cdisc_notes: Dose form of the treatment.

variables.name: EXDOSFRQ
variables.label: Dosing Frequency per Interval
variables.cdisc_notes: Usually expressed as the number of doses per time period.

variables.name: EXROUTE
variables.label: Route of Administration
variables.cdisc_notes: Route of administration.

variables.name: EXSTDTC
variables.label: Start Date/Time of Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: Start date/time of the treatment in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: EXENDTC
variables.label: End Date/Time of Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: End date/time of the treatment in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: EXSTDY
variables.label: Study Day of Start of Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of start of treatment relative to RFSTDTC.

variables.name: EXENDY
variables.label: Study Day of End of Treatment
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of end of treatment relative to RFSTDTC.

LB.structure: One record per lab test per visit per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: LBSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: LBTESTCD
variables.label: Lab Test or Examination Short Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination. Max 8 characters.

variables.name: LBTEST
variables.label: Lab Test or Examination Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim name of the test or examination used to obtain the measurement or finding.

variables.name: LBCAT
variables.label: Category for Lab Test
variables.cdisc_notes: Used to define a category of tests (e.g., HEMATOLOGY, CHEMISTRY).

variables.name: LBORRES
variables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Result of the measurement or finding as originally received or collected.

variables.name: LBORRESU
variables.label: Original Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Original units in which the data were collected.

variables.name: LBORNRLO
variables.label: Reference Range Lower Limit-Orig Unit
variables.cdisc_notes: Lower end of reference range used at the performing laboratory.

variables.name: LBORNRHI
variables.label: Reference Range Upper Limit-Orig Unit
variables.cdisc_notes: Upper end of reference range used at the performing laboratory.

variables.name: LBSTRESC
variables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
variables.cdisc_notes: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from LBORRES in a standard format.

variables.name: LBSTRESN
variables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Used for continuous or numeric results in standard format; copied in standard units from LBORRES.

variables.name: LBSTRESU
variables.label: Standard Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Standardized units used for LBSTRESC and LBSTRESN.

variables.name: LBSTNRLO
variables.label: Reference Range Lower Limit-Std Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Lower end of reference range for standardized values.

variables.name: LBSTNRHI
variables.label: Reference Range Upper Limit-Std Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Upper end of reference range for standardized values.

variables.name: LBNRIND
variables.label: Reference Range Indicator
variables.cdisc_notes: Indicates where value falls with respect to reference range (e.g., NORMAL, LOW, HIGH).

variables.name: LBSPEC
variables.label: Specimen Type
variables.cdisc_notes: Defines the type of specimen used for a measurement.

variables.name: VISITNUM
variables.label: Visit Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Clinical encounter number.

variables.name: VISIT
variables.label: Visit Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.

variables.name: LBDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Specimen Collection
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of specimen collection in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: LBDY
variables.label: Study Day of Specimen Collection
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of specimen collection relative to RFSTDTC.

VS.structure: One record per vital sign measurement per visit per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: VSSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: VSTESTCD
variables.label: Vital Signs Test Short Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Short name of the test. Examples: SYSBP, DIABP, PULSE, WEIGHT, HEIGHT, TEMP, RESP.

variables.name: VSTEST
variables.label: Vital Signs Test Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim name of the test or examination.

variables.name: VSPOS
variables.label: Vital Signs Position of Subject
variables.cdisc_notes: Position of the subject during the measurement (e.g., STANDING, SITTING, SUPINE).

variables.name: VSORRES
variables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Result of the vital signs measurement as originally received or collected.

variables.name: VSORRESU
variables.label: Original Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Original units in which the data were collected.

variables.name: VSSTRESC
variables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
variables.cdisc_notes: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from VSORRES in a standard format.

variables.name: VSSTRESN
variables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Used for continuous or numeric results in standard format.

variables.name: VSSTRESU
variables.label: Standard Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Standardized units used for VSSTRESC and VSSTRESN.

variables.name: VISITNUM
variables.label: Visit Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Clinical encounter number.

variables.name: VISIT
variables.label: Visit Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.

variables.name: VSDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Vital Signs
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of the vital signs measurement in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: VSDY
variables.label: Study Day of Vital Signs
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of vital signs measurement relative to RFSTDTC.

EG.structure: One record per ECG test per visit per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: EGSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: EGTESTCD
variables.label: ECG Test Short Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Short name of the ECG test. Examples: HRMEAN, PRMEAN, QRSDUR, QTMEAN, RRMEAN.

variables.name: EGTEST
variables.label: ECG Test Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim name of the ECG test or examination.

variables.name: EGORRES
variables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Result of the ECG measurement as originally received or collected.

variables.name: EGORRESU
variables.label: Original Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Original units in which the data were collected.

variables.name: EGSTRESC
variables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
variables.cdisc_notes: Contains the result value for all findings in a standard format.

variables.name: EGSTRESN
variables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Used for continuous or numeric results in standard format.

variables.name: EGSTRESU
variables.label: Standard Units
variables.cdisc_notes: Standardized units used for EGSTRESC and EGSTRESN.

variables.name: VISITNUM
variables.label: Visit Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Clinical encounter number.

variables.name: VISIT
variables.label: Visit Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.

variables.name: EGDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of ECG
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of the ECG measurement in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: EGDY
variables.label: Study Day of ECG
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of ECG measurement relative to RFSTDTC.

MH.structure: One record per medical history event per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: MHSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: MHTERM
variables.label: Reported Term for the Medical History
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim name of the medical history event.

variables.name: MHMODIFY
variables.label: Modified Reported Term
variables.cdisc_notes: If MHTERM is modified to facilitate coding, then MHMODIFY will contain the modified text.

variables.name: MHDECOD
variables.label: Dictionary-Derived Term
variables.cdisc_notes: Dictionary-derived text description of MHTERM.

variables.name: MHBODSYS
variables.label: Body System or Organ Class
variables.cdisc_notes: Dictionary-derived. Body system or organ class.

variables.name: MHCAT
variables.label: Category for Medical History
variables.cdisc_notes: Used to define a category of medical history events.

variables.name: MHPRESP
variables.label: Medical History Event Pre-Specified
variables.cdisc_notes: Used when a specific medical history event is pre-specified on the CRF. Value is Y.

variables.name: MHOCCUR
variables.label: Medical History Occurrence
variables.cdisc_notes: Used to indicate whether a pre-specified event occurred. Values are Y or N.

variables.name: MHSTDTC
variables.label: Start Date/Time of Medical History
variables.cdisc_notes: Start date/time of the medical history event in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: MHENDTC
variables.label: End Date/Time of Medical History
variables.cdisc_notes: End date/time of the medical history event in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: MHENRF
variables.label: End Relative to Reference Period
variables.cdisc_notes: Describes the end of the event relative to the reference period. Expected values: BEFORE, DURING, AFTER.

DS.structure: One record per disposition status or protocol milestone per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: DSSEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: DSTERM
variables.label: Reported Term for the Disposition Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Verbatim name of the disposition event.

variables.name: DSDECOD
variables.label: Standardized Disposition Term
variables.cdisc_notes: Standardized or dictionary-derived text description of DSTERM.

variables.name: DSCAT
variables.label: Category for Disposition Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Used to define a category of disposition events (e.g., DISPOSITION EVENT, PROTOCOL MILESTONE).

variables.name: DSSCAT
variables.label: Subcategory for Disposition Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Used to define a sub-category of disposition events.

variables.name: DSSTDTC
variables.label: Start Date/Time of Disposition Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Start date/time of the disposition event in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: DSDY
variables.label: Study Day of Start of Disposition Event
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of start of disposition event relative to RFSTDTC.

IE.structure: One record per inclusion/exclusion criterion not met per subject

variables.name: STUDYID
variables.label: Study Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Unique identifier for a study.

variables.name: DOMAIN
variables.label: Domain Abbreviation
variables.cdisc_notes: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

variables.name: USUBJID
variables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variables.cdisc_notes: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.

variables.name: IESEQ
variables.label: Sequence Number
variables.cdisc_notes: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset for a subject.

variables.name: IETESTCD
variables.label: Incl/Excl Criterion Short Name
variables.cdisc_notes: Short name for the criterion (e.g., INCL01, EXCL03). Max 8 characters.

variables.name: IETEST
variables.label: Incl/Excl Criterion
variables.cdisc_notes: Full text of the inclusion or exclusion criterion.

variables.name: IECAT
variables.label: Incl/Excl Category
variables.cdisc_notes: Category: INCLUSION or EXCLUSION.

variables.name: IESCAT
variables.label: Incl/Excl Subcategory
variables.cdisc_notes: Subcategory for the criterion.

variables.name: IEORRES
variables.label: Incl/Excl Criterion Original Result
variables.cdisc_notes: Original result for the criterion (e.g., Y or N).

variables.name: IESTRESC
variables.label: Incl/Excl Criterion Result in Std Format
variables.cdisc_notes: Standardized result for the criterion.

variables.name: IEDTC
variables.label: Date/Time of Collection
variables.cdisc_notes: Date/time of the assessment in ISO 8601 format.

variables.name: IEDY
variables.label: Study Day of Collection
variables.cdisc_notes: Study day of assessment relative to RFSTDTC.
